caption: Best Fries in town.  Will be back
Friendly service, owner and staff do a great job making you feel welcome. Excellent assortment of chilled beers on draft, food is fantastic.    A must place to visit.
Great cool place. Very nice service. Johnny - four finger, the bar tender is the best. The owner Dan comes around and says hello. Good place to relax while touring. Plenty of drinks to choose from.
Good place to eat if you are in a rush not looking for elaborated dishes
The general manager greeted us and the bar tender was patient and amazing. The staff and food are incomparable 10/10 recommend
Fantastic experience. We had great burgers and the staff was awesome. Beautiful location in a neat old warehouse. Owner greeted us and was very gracious. Highly recommend.
Amazing service and amazing food! And I don't usually say places have amazing service :)
Customer service was absolutely superb!
Best "Disco" fries this Jersey girl has had, outside of Jersey!!😋
Short rib fry plate had a lot of short rib on it and it was fantastic.  Salads were good. Fried chicken sandwich and burger were excellent. Great customer service.
Service was incredible. The burger was really good and the fries were hot and fresh. Liked the atmosphere .
The best service ever! The food and the environment were great, everything is really clean and enjoyable. The customer service is absolute exceptional
A must stop! Great food and service!
From the service to the food! So good!! Love it!
Great service and food was delicious.  Fish and chips was just right- crispy and served with malty vinegar.
I love this place!! Great food and great staff!!!
Brunch  was excellent great service
Super cool but wasn't open late

The Owner Dan was wonderful! Brandon was our server he was awesome socks! The BEST SCOTCH EGG IVE EVER HAD EVERRRR!! CPULDVE EATEN A GAZILLION IF I DIDNT HAVE THE CAR BOMBS LYING IN WAIT!! The Fish and Chips Special was so good we fought …
Awesome. Everyone loved it. The Mayor (with buffalo sauce of course) was one of the best fried chicken sandwiches I've ever had.

As a big burger fan, I have to say they have one of the best burgers in the country!  I've indulged and highly enjoyed Au Cheval in Chicago which is always ranked top ten and Bumpa's easily competes with that.  Keep up the great work guys, we had a great time visiting and enjoying all your great food and drinks.
Family owned by brother that know how treat people and have an amazing atmosphere. The special was a Reuben sandwich that was cleverly prepared and the kids loved the hospitality and food.
Awesome staff. Awesome vibe. Awesome food. Awesome everything. Very clean.

Bumpas has the best bar food in Charleston. Their french fries have ruined my perception of fries at other places. Also try their chili! The staff is friendly and welcoming, Johnny and John made the bar run smooth while providing great service and lively conversation. Thumbs up!
Loved everything about it. We tried a little bit of everything. The way the original architecture has been preserved definitely adds to the charm.
Wicked Hot Dog and awesome staff!
The live music was great and our neighboring patrons were entertaining.
The staff was top notch. The food was awesome, the best french fries I think I ever had. The ice is scandalously good. Sorry no photo, I was so busy eating I didn't think about a picture.
SCOTCH EGGS DONE RIGHT!! Oh superbly scrumptious. I am so happy we popped in here for lunch! Great serious and did I mention the scotch eggs? So flipping good🤩

We got fries to go so we could go eat them by the water. They were absolutely delicious! We got carmalized onions, popcorn chicken, and beer cheese as our toppings. My only qualm was that the cheese could have been thicker, it was more like …

Service was slow. Waitress was not at all attentive. Food was okay. Not a lot of cheese on the fries, but the hotdog was delicious and the burger was good. Like a fresher, homemade take on a McDonald's burger. Probably won't go back, but it was a nice new place.
Loved it!!

Our brunch favorites were: the hashbrown cakes, shrimp benedict, and the beet + Bleu salad with truffle dressing...yum! With the inclusion of bottomless mimosas, it makes for the perfect brunch spot! The staff is friendly and safe. Will definitely be by again for a cocktail and to try some of their dinner options!
Doesn't get any better menu options and cocktails Fabulous. Highly recommend the Cobb salad, scotch eggs, Cumberland chili. Worth the drive! Very clean.
Very chill bar atmosphere with great live music. Waiters are super nice and attentive. Enjoyed my time here
Aweaome service GREAT food. Worth the 1.5 hour drive!
Amazing Frys and very nice staff.
Great service, awesome burger, and the live music was an added bonus.
Very delicious! Hot dogs were awesome and very filling. Fries were fresh. Johnny was polite, informative, and just a pleasure. Can't wait to come back!
Live music pulled us in but the atmosphere and lovely bartenders also kept us. No frills, just an excellent bar with amazing food.
Great food, friendly crew and a great bourbon selection too...
Treated like royalty! Food was over the top Delicious! Must try the Scotch eggs !

The worst experience that I have ever had.  The staff, bartenders are great.   The general Manger is horrible.   I will never go back to this establishment, that I took several friends to after a great first experience.   She should be fired, immediately.   I will be seeking a conversation with the owner.
Great atmosphere to be with friends and enjoy great food!!! WE LOVE IT! RECOMMEND 100%
Cumberland Chili was trash.  Everything else was wonderful.  Great place overall.
The food was excellent. Very fresh and delicious. The staff was amazing one of the co-owner's even came over and talked to us. I highly recommend this place!!!
Great food and friendly staff
Such a great place! The fries were absolutely delicious and I wish we ordered another round to go! The service was nice and the atmosphere was neat. Will definitely be going back!!
Great food and Service!
Great food, great atmosphere!! Neil the bartender was awesome!
Awesome space and Neal at the bar is fabulous! So yourself a favor a try the scotch egg!
Very friendly and cozy. Enjoyed so much that we came back later that same day.

Just ate and Bumpas, and it's restaurant week in Charleston. Excellent food and service, much more than I could eat. I had Disco fries- awesome, and the Southpaw Burger. Both were large portions. The waiter, Brandon, was very attentive and …

Came here for Restaurant Week. First time here and completely ecstatic about our choice. Delicious food, huge portions and attentive staff.  We had the hot dog, chicken sandwich and we tried two types of the loaded fries. We will definitely be back again!
Stoped in just to peek. Ended up staying for some great cocktails and some cold IPA's The atmosphere is very relaxing and service on point. Will be back !

Short staffed, no eta after an hour wait... food rushed out after complaining but people ahead of us still never received their food even after we had completely finished eating. Waitress does not acknowledge you or your frustration rather …
the manager was exceptionally rude to me. So much so, I left without ordering anything. I’d rather give my money elsewhere.

Decor is exposed brick and wooden beams -- really beautiful place. But, you go there for the food and drink. Lots of drink selections and impressive selection of local draft beer. I ordered the fish & chips. We used to live in England and …
Good food
Fantastic food from a one-of-a-kind menu and a staff that is warm and friendly.

This restaurant/bar has only been open for a few months. It is impressive. Decor is exposed brick and wooden beams -- really beautiful place. But, you go there for the food and drink. Lots of drink selections and impressive selection of …
Thoroughly enjoyed our outside drinks and snacks; Joe was a wealth of knowledge energy! Great job🥃🍸🍻
Excellent bar staff and enjoyed my night out!  Friendly owner as well very outgoing.  Great comfort/gastro food as well.  Highly recommend

The Stag & Boar Burger was Amazing.  Service and Staff were superior.  Would definitely recommend this establishment to anyone who visits or lives in Charleston.  A++++++ in my book.  Will definitely come back when I come to Charleston.  Awesome ambiance to boot!!!
(Translated by Google) Putin  (Original) Poutine
Absolutely delicious.  Had the disco fries and can't wait to head back for more. Don't let this one fade away Charleston, it's a keeper.

We had a large party of 8 and went to Bumpas for lunch one Saturday. The service was great. The manager and owner both kept coming by to check on us. We had Scotch eggs, cheese and short rib dips and a keg of fries with chili, cheese and …

We've tried a few new restaurants each week since we moved here last year.  We recently discovered Bumpa's when our friend visited us for the weekend.  The atmosphere and building is very nice,  and the staff is equally nice and inviting. …

Absolutely delightful. The pricing is good, the staff is friendly, our server Nichole was spot on, the drinks are great, and the the food was fantastic. I had the Maureen O'Hara's Left Hook, the boyfriend had a Guinness and we split Jo's …
Food and staff  were awesome. Owners real cool and genuine. A great spot if your downtown. Definitely worth your money.
Wonderful atmosphere and attentive, friendly staff, with a menu and food to match. Definately coming back.
Excellent food, excellent service, excellent drinks. 5 well deserved stars.
Great food,  great atmosphere and great workers.
great place and John the bartender is Fantastic!!!
Such good food- great vibes and they have amazing vegetarian options for non meat eaters!
Loved everything from the vibe to the food. Watch this space - great things will come from this spot!
Absolutely fantastic! Cant say enough awesome things about the food, service and atmosphere. Can't wait to go back.
Nice place
Awesome!!!

This place is amazing!  Spoke to one of the owners (they are brothers) and he gave us the whole story.  They did a 17 month renovation on the building and were going to open in April 2020.  Due to Covid, they delayed a few months.  Stop by …
Great food!  Had burgers and fries.  Food was very good.  Excellent service and great people.
Good band
Lauren was an amazing server. Very attentive and kind. Food was good, staff was even better.
Off the beaten path! Lovely hidden gem! Brunch was the bomb! They were very accommodating and our server Lauren was fabulous!
Great lunch spot with solid beer selection! Service was top notch as well!

This place is an absolute must. The food is fantastic and large. The owners and whole staff make you feel part of their family. They are one on one if you have questions. We live here in Charleston so it's become one of our favorite spots. …

The food was awesome! We had a Big Bumpa Burger (very very good), sausage and peppers (very good), but we may go back again because of the fries.  Our server, Hunter, was very nice and helpful in helping us pick out a great dinner.

Cool vibes all around and the best Disco fries I've ever had! Corey and Brandon were great, very friendly and funny , My lady and I enjoyed two visits here and would definitely do a third whenever we're back in SC. 5 stars all the way.  Cheers🍻🍻Guys, we love BUMPAS💥👊😅
Great customer service. When I walked in the bartenders were busy I let them know I had a call in & it came out after some time. But the associate that brought it out was very friendly
Excellent customer service. I loved my food.
Absolutely amazing! Service is great. Food, beer I am totally happy.

Great cocktails, nice atmosphere and friendly staff. The boar/venison burger blew us away, and the specialty "jersey" fries tasted just like the fries we had in jersey 2 weeks ago. Off a side road but next to all the main stuff. Don't miss it!
Incredible.
Great food, friendly staff.
So glad we found this place a little off the beaten path. It’s a pub-type atmosphere and the food was delicious. We especially loved the disco fries!
Service and food were amazing! Love the amount of work that was put into the detail! Everything from plates to water pitchers to light fixtures. Very well done!
A beautiful understanding staff, very relaxing environment, great service, wonderful beer on tap. I'm very happy to have spent an afternoon here!

Came here for brunch and had the best meal! We ordered the fried chicken sandwich with dukes mayo, a side of fries and a side of fruit! Delicious!! The chicken was juicy and came with pickled onions and jalapenos on the side. We also …
Had the benedict with shrimp cake, my friend had the short rib. Some of the best Benedict we've ever had. Great mimosas too.
Amazing! From the reception throughout.. cocktails are delicious. Great vibe and music is a plus. Thanks JR
Stopped for a late lunch and was pleased that we went. A little of the the main area around the city market so you have to look for it.
Had a wonderful Brunch here! The service was incredible the food was delicious and highly recommend!

For Downtown Charleston,  the price of the food was as awesome as the food itself, only $12 for what's called a Southpaw,  a double cheeseburger made with fresh made patties, your choice of cheese, all the regular toppings, on a soft …

Off the main street, chill vibe, live music with a guy singing with his guitar. Food was good. The fried chicken on my Cobb Salad was too salty, but maybe just how people like it around here, or just want to get you drink more beers, who …

This is the best new place in charleston! I have been looking for an old charmy modern place to grab a drink / bite to eat and I have found it! So cute. Such friendly staff and delicious food. I will bring everyone here in the future!! Neil the bartender is great!
Great food & drink... nice atmosphere
Friendly, delicious, safe (covid), quaint! Loved it and will absolutely be going back!!!
A hidden gem. From the clean restroom to the amazing service and even better food. This place is a needle in a haystack but when you find it, you won't be disappointed.

Bumpa's was great! We were drawn to check it out initially because of its name -- like the owners, Bumpa was the name we called my late Grandpa. And this place had the atmosphere and food that I imagine my Bumpa would have approved of. …
Amazing Bacon Infused Vodka. Great place to see renovated being a special vibe to Charleston.
Great place ! Great service
Great customer services. Food was outstanding. We are visiting Charleston and have recommended Bumpa's to all when asked if we knew a great restaurant to eat.
Perfect atmosphere.  Great cocktails and beer.  Wonderful service.  The food looked great although we didn't try any.
Excellent food! Excellent service! Very friendly staff! I highly recommend this restaurant!
Great ford and great atmosphere! Super nice owner named Dan.

I cannot say enough good things about this place. One of the owners waited on us and made the experience even better. From the starter fries to the entrees, everything was phenomenal. For only being open a few months, this restaurant is going to do amazing things!

A MUST VISIT! Had a great time with my wife at Bumpa's in Charleston. The food was ON POINT. Their signature fries and off-the-menu burgers were just delicious. The next time you visit Charleston, do yourself a solid and hit this …

This was by far my favorite bar experience in Charleston.  The owners and GM were waiting tables and actively engaging wth their customers.  They also are the friendliest and nicest people.  Dan Sullivan- you're an excellent owner! Thank …
Great food and very friendly staff and owner!
Service and food were excellent. Great drink selection. We went on a Saturday night and the live music was great. This should be one of your regular spots for sure.
Good place for good food and beer
Amazing fries, a fun cocktail menu, and an incredibly friendly atmosphere and staff.
Great environment and incredible food. It's a family friendly place to go and everyone is so nice. The food...can't even rave enough about it!!
Wife and I went for brunch and were thoroughly impressed! Staff was prompt and incredibly friendly and welcoming! Food was amazing! This is the type of experience that people come to Charleston for!
My husband and I had an amazing Sunday brunch at this charming place. The staff was very friendly and the food was beyond impressive! Will definitely be returning, and often!
The food was amazing and came out fast. Every one was supper nice. The food was really good and not a bad price. Will definitely be back
We found this place by accident, and it was the best accident our family could have happened.  Food was perfect, and the service was the best I have ever had in my life.
Wonderful atmosphere and great food. Staff was very attentive as well. Their fries are to die for!
I was walking by hungry and found this place. The food is super fresh and delicious! Give this place a chance if you are in the area!
Disco fries is where it’s at!!! Braised short ribs were on point!

While visiting Charleston for the first time we stumbled across this place. My family and I had a large party, with a bunch of crazy kids. As soon as we came in it just felt right. Ambiance means alot, and this place had it. We were warmly …
Love it there! Great staff, beer and food! The scotch egg is awesome, and so is everything else we ate there.
New enjoy. Great kitchen, excellent concept. Drink enjoy
We had such a great experience at Bumpa’s with Shane as our server! Food was served quickly and had incredible flavor.
Incredible food and service! Shane did a great job. Portion sizes are large. Dishes are unique and tasty! I highly recommend the disco fries.
Best fries I’ve ever had, mixed with friendly service and a great atmosphere, makes for a great experience.
Neal is the best !

Great for families...great kids menu...friendly hostess...and very attentive waitress..started my meal with the golden beet and blue  cheese salad...It was freakin awesome....didnt want it to end! Then ordered the southpaw burger with a …
Excellent drinks and fries that are beyond belief.

Went for lunch with some friends today.  Food was fantastic and they made some great improvements to the interior of the building compared to the prior restaurant in this space.  Great service.. Every employee that came by to talk to us, …
Great, locally owned bar with family and building history. Fantastically restored warehouse with amazing local beer selections and all the fry options! Get the Bumpa history lesson while you're here.

Everything we had was amazing. The staff was nice and friendly, everything was clean, safe, sanitized and distanced appropriately. Food was the best I’ve had in months. Will definitely be back super soon

Really enjoyed our visit to Bumpas. Great food, drinks, and service in a laid back atmosphere. The owner checked on us a couple times to make sure we enjoyed ourselves and took the time to chat with us about our thoughts after our meal!

Five-star atmosphere, service, and food. Had a drink at the bar while I waited for takeout food, co-owners Dan and Conor were very friendly and welcoming. Got my food back to my office a block away, and realized there was no chili on my hot …

We stumbled upon this place while we were walking around Charleston on a hot summer day. The owner and waitress were very attentive and kind. The drinks were amazing! Beautiful architecture. Dan said it was an old phosphate factory.  As an architect myself.  I say well done on the renovation.  We will definitely be back.

This place is absolutely amazing great atmosphere great food and fantastic drinks Plus the staff and owner of this exceptional establishment are friendly and attentive I will be back again to this place from Charlotte NC and that should tell you something A1 👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾
Awesome cocktails! After hearing about Bumpa’s we checked it out. Great little place to stop by!

The fries and dog were amazing, but Branden really made the experience. Extremely humble and knowledgeable behind the bar, this master liquor smith created me a cocktail that made me question my drink of choice for thr past 5 years.

(Translated by Google) Awesome !! Really excellent, very friendly staff and great atmosphere. A great discovery in Charleston. We recommend it very much!  (Original) Awesome !! Vraiment excellent, le personnel très sympa et très bonne ambiance. Une super découverte à Charleston. We recommend it very much !
This place nailed it!  Great food, service and feel.  Steps away from waterfront. This a new joint with the care and heart this city built it's F&B reputation upon.

First time in Charleston and we hit a lot of the recommended spots.  Stumbled upon this place that had just opened.  It was phenomenal and the atmosphere amazing.  I'm from Louisiana and accustomed to great food and drinks and this place is definitely a spot to hit while in town. Friendly and hard working owners,  CHEERS TO BUMPA!!!

Our new favorite friendly neighborhood bar.  Fantastic spirits selection at a great price. I highly recommend a bottle of the Taittinger with The Mayor fried chicken sandwich! Casual comfort and the finer things in life all rolled into one amazing venue! I've finally found my Cheers!
Went with a buddy last night, what an awesome spot. Donnie and Dan were great, and the food was spot-on. Can't wait to see what this place will do in the future.
